node.excerpt: Search is a problem I'm currently taking a big interest in. The legacy project I maintain has an utterly abominable search facility, one that I'm eager to replace with something…
For the uninitiated, OpenSearch is the technology that lets you enter a site's URL, and then press Tab to start searching on that site - you can see it in action on this site. It's…
